name: Alien Invasion
description:
Join the battle to save earth from aliens and robots. Choose to play on the side of humans or aliens in battle.

1. Choose a side whether humans or robots/aliens
2. Choose a main weapon, secondary and lethal options to optimize your chances of success
3. Play alongside up to 100 online players
4. Choose various levels
5. Play in various modes such as capture the king, rush, team deathmatch, conquest.
